sentences.en: A flowing stream inarms a boulder in its passing.
A massive boulder blocked the entrance of the cave.
sentences.cn: 一块巨大的圆石堵住了山洞的入口.

sentences.en: Boulder body can not be cross - pressure, sometimes bending twist sigh.
sentences.cn: 巨石无法压 跨 的身躯, 有时会被叹息拧弯.

sentences.en: Boulder Chinese Evangelical Free Church welcome you visit our site.
sentences.cn: 欢迎访问报德华人播道会网站!

sentences.en: Boulder High School's entry featured savory beef and shredded cabbage.
sentences.cn: 博尔德高中的颇具特点的参赛菜肴是令人食欲大开的牛肉椰菜丝.

sentences.en: He could be transferred to Boulder, Colorado at any time.
sentences.cn: 他随时可能被转移到科罗拉多博得尔市.

sentences.en: He despised the boulder, for he knew that victory was already his.
sentences.cn: 他蔑视这块礁石, 他知道自己已经胜利.

sentences.en: He stepped clear of the boulder.
sentences.cn: 他从大石头后面走了出来.

sentences.en: He took my hand to help me over a boulder that blocked the way.
sentences.cn: 他牵着我的手带我爬过那块挡道的卵石.

sentences.en: He was unable to budge the boulder.
I saw her push the boulder down on you.
sentences.cn: 我看见她将巨石推下砸向你。

sentences.en: Imagine trying to balance a chest of drawers on just one of its legs, on top of a boulder, and you get an idea of what Gray gets up to.
sentences.cn: 想像自己尝试仅仅依靠衣柜的一个腿把它平稳地放到一个大圆石上，你就知道格雷达到了什么境界。

sentences.en: It is thought that the train hit a boulder that had fallen down a cliff on to the track.
sentences.cn: 人们认为这列火车撞到了从悬崖滚到铁轨上的大圆石。

sentences.en: It required superhuman effort to lift the huge boulder .
sentences.cn: 要搬起这块大石头需要有超人的力量。

sentences.en: It required superhuman effort to lift the huge boulder.
sentences.cn: 要搬起这块大石头需要有超人的力量.

sentences.en: Now, if we want to move that boulder, we have machines.
sentences.cn: 现在, 如果你想搬那块大石头, 我们可以运用机器.

sentences.en: The boulder sheltered them from the chilling wind.
sentences.cn: 那块大石头替他们挡住了寒风。

sentences.en: We all heaved together and removed the boulder.
sentences.cn: 大家一齐用劲,把大石头搬开了.

trans.tran_cn: 卵石，圆石，巨砾，冰砾，漂砾
trans.tran_en: a large round piece of rock
